title: How to tell riot has ranked in a good plac right now
body:
http://prntscr.com/cv95cg
http://prntscr.com/cv95k1

my first game today i had an afk top at 15 minutes. 

2 games after that my supp left at 10 minutes because she was "lagging"


ive had 4 afks today. 4 afks with 9 games. the rest of the 5 games ive had 2 intent feeders and 1 troll.

im done with ranked untl riot sends me a response saying they are sorry for what they created.

until riot admits that me demoting off 2 intent feeders in a row was their failure to balance solo queue, i will never try another game i play.

replies.body: Honestly, if you're tilting this hard over it, you probably *should* stay away from Ranked. Yeah, it sucks, but getting this worked up over it isn't healthy.

> [{quoted}](name=DrCyanide,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bEoItBxo,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-10-17T06:15:45.281+0000)
>
> Honestly, if you're tilting this hard over it, you probably *should* stay away from Ranked. Yeah, it sucks, but getting this worked up over it isn't healthy.

Nope. I'm queueing up tomorrow and making everyone just as miserable as I am. It's not fair that riot can give me 4 afks and think I'm gonna move on. Miss me wth that fucking retarded thought process. I'm going to make half of diamond yell at riot for their inability to make solo queue rewarding whatsoever for the individual player . Every single game I play I'm goign to do the most braindead shit and if anyone rages I'm sending ina ticket and then doing it over.

"I'm mad that people make me lose games!  Therefore, I will make people lose games!"

Gee, I wonder how this problem keeps happening more and more often?  Oh well... we'll figure it out SOME day.

> [{quoted}](name=Deitrix,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bEoItBxo,comment-id=000300000001,timestamp=2016-10-17T09:22:31.931+0000)
>
> "I'm mad that people make me lose games!  Therefore, I will make people lose games!"
> 
> Gee, I wonder how this problem keeps happening more and more often?  Oh well... we'll figure it out SOME day.

im obviously never going to go through and troll on purpose. i just wish i was that kind of person. some people truly deserve it.

How many of the people you're raging at do you think are people JUST like you who are frustrated?

Everyone thinks they're right.  Even the afk's and the trolls.  You're not helping things by being a rager about it.  Don't ranked if you're not prepared to deal with that kind of awful BS.

> It's not fair that riot can give me 4 afks and think I'm gonna move on.

If Riot knew those players were going to go AFK they would have stopped them from queuing up in the first place. 

> I'm queueing up tomorrow and making everyone just as miserable as I am. 

See, this isn't healthy! 

Trolling others isn't going to make you feel better, and it's not going to magically drop those 4 games. If you're being honest with yourself, the worst they'll feel the way you did after the first game, since they're not going to sit in lobby with you on their team again.

Don't be this guy, consumed by his emotions and manipulated into doing dumb things.
http://a.dilcdn.com/bl/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2012/08/Untitled-12.png

> [{quoted}](name=DrCyanide,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bEoItBxo,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2016-10-17T06:31:35.454+0000)

> Trolling others isn't going to make you feel better, and it's not going to magically drop those 4 games. If you're being honest with yourself, the worst they'll feel the way you did after the first game, since they're not going to sit in lobby with you on their team again.
> 
> Don't be this guy, consumed by his emotions and manipulated into doing dumb things.
> http://a.dilcdn.com/bl/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2012/08/Untitled-12.png

i feel cheated. i went from d3 0 lp to d4 24 lp because riot pit me with 2 intent feeders and 4 afks in a span of 9 games. no one deserves that

I imagine if AFKs and Intentional Feeders in your games was something you could "deserve" then no one would want that punishment tier :)

For what it's worth, how close together they happened doesn't make a huge difference on your rank. You lost 76 LP over 9 games, which is a lot less than the losing spree I was on (won 1/10 games, and had a victory turn to defeat because of a DC). 

You're still Diamond, and there's still time in the season to get back some LP and hit D3 again. 

I know it probably doesn't matter to you, but I always feel screwed over by matchmaking this time of year. The Victorious skin gets announced, then all the noobs want to play their placements, and all the smurfs want to get extra copies of the skin, and between them both it's just pure luck trying to go anywhere. Two years in a row now I've hit Silver 1, only to fall right after the skin was announced. 

If I was in your shoes, I don't think I'd stress about Diamond 4 vs Diamond 3. You've got your border, you've got your skin, and *you* know how good you are.

> [{quoted}](name=DrCyanide,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bEoItBxo,comment-id=00030000000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-17T07:02:51.499+0000)

The Victorious skin gets announced, then all the noobs want to play their placements, and all the smurfs want to get extra copies of the skin, and between them both it's just pure luck trying to go anywhere. Two years in a row now I've hit Silver 1, only to fall right after the skin was announced. 
> 
> If I was in your shoes, I don't think I'd stress about Diamond 4 vs Diamond 3. You've got your border, you've got your skin, and *you* know how good you are.

yea man but i want to climb. i want to feel liek my skill is being rewarded. but all these intent feeders and afks are pissing me off. its so annoying to feel like you're the only one getting targeted by afks and trolls.

how would u feel if u get promoted to d3 then demote off 2 intent feeders in a row and jus tlike that you're back to square one.

it feels like shit.

I got4 in 9 games. That's not part of the game has one person afked on the enemy team it would be, but since they all afked on mine, it's worthy of babyraging and it's worthy of much more anger.

they say doing the same thing over and over without learning anything is the definition of crazy

Did the big yellow exclamation mark letting you know that there's something wrong with the game currently, the end of season yearly issues, and unending pattern of issues not tell you that there might be a problem with playing this weekend while the kids were out of school both here and abroad in countries that attack our servers?

It didn't tell me I would be the only one affected by the afks rather than the enemy team having just one disadvantage once in their fucking lives.
how many times do you have to have "bad luck" before you conclude its probably more than just luck

You're right. It was my own individual skill that caused my jungle to rq at 10 minutes when he died once to a failed bot gank. Fuck that was my b . I'll improve next time I promise :) it was my fault the first game I played when my top afked when no one typed once in the chat at 13 minutes by himself . Whoops :) it was my fault 3 games in when my support was lagging and left at 8 minutes. FUCK sorry!!!!!
What would this even be called. Its like a strawman argument implied through sarcastic proxy. Or I guess I could just call it stupid... Do you think most disconnects are 100% random? Are you new?

SO IT IS MY FAULT? ITS MY FAULT SO I DESERVE TO DEMOTE BECAUSE OF OTHER PLAYERS WITH BAD INTERNET CONNECTION? MY POINT IS IF SOMEONE ELSE AFKS I SHOULDNT BE THE ONE TO LOSE WITH HIM. I DID NOTBIGN TO DESERVE MY DEMOTION. YOU CAN STICK UP ALL YOU WANT FOR THIS SHITTY ASS COMPANY BUT IN THE END YOU ARE LOW ELO ADN DONT KNWO WHAT ITS LIKE TO DEMOTE FROM A REALLY HARD FUCKING LEAGUE.

did i say it was your fault? All i said is it wasn't riot's fault for other players having a bad connection, it's that players fault... not yours not riots.

Get your head out your ass guy.

Do you think your friends are going to care about your rank or something? Based on your attitude I'm just assuming bronze or silver, maybe gold... trust me, nobody cares.

Play the game if you're having fun. If you're not, don't play. Playing just to get points in a ranking system is NOT why you should be playing a game, sir.

Do try to have a good night.
Good luck.

I'm now here near bronze or gold or plat. Don't assume my rank because I've had a bunch of afkingn assholes of FUCKING teammates who tilt me more than anything ok buddy . This game isn't fun. There is no fun in league of FUCKING rng legends .
